snippet: Since the arrival of the earliest car radios in the 1920s, automakers have added sound systems in many different formats. Here are a few highlights from the audio past.
abstract: Since the arrival of the earliest car radios in the 1920s, automakers have added sound systems in many different formats. Here are a few highlights from the audio past.

headline.main: Rhythms for the Highway, Before the Age of the iPod
